response.original_title: 実在してはならない…投稿心霊映像 お前は誰だ？ 心霊映像は伝染する。
response.overview: For some reason, the OOPS reporting team receives photos and videos even though they are not solicited. And some of them are so strange that we wonder, “What is it? Some of them are quite surprising. When this happens, we naturally ask for follow-up interviews, but in most cases, we are unable to reach them. In addition, there are cases where the images are not only in the submitted video, but also in the materials shot by professional photographers. What are these identities...?
response.title: Should Not Exist... Submitted Spirit Videos: Who Are You? Spirit Videos Spread.
